title: my spells are auto casted
body:
Since i upgraded to a new pc my spells are casted the moment i press them where my mouse cursus currently is.
This never happened to me before and i searched everywhere to find a solution.If i hold up my key then i can choose where to cast them but its kinda annoying.my specs are 
gtx 1070 evga
intel celeron g1840 2.8 ghz
8gb ram
windows 10

replies.body: This is just a question but why don't you use smart cast? It's better for gameplay, most abilties

> [{quoted}](name=SenpaiNoticeMeh,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8lXtbWhh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-11T15:54:32.372+0000)
>
> This is just a question but why don't you use smart cast? It's better for gameplay, most abilties

To each their own.  Depends what a player may be most comfortable with.  It took me a while to switch to smart cast personally.  It took me even longer to use hot keys to learn my abilities versus clicking on it.  All things will gradually come over time!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8lXtbWhh,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-11T16:17:46.738+0000)
>
> To each their own.  Depends what a player may be most comfortable with.  It took me a while to switch to smart cast personally.  It took me even longer to use hot keys to learn my abilities versus clicking on it.  All things will gradually come over time!

Haha, I agree. I keep my camera locked. I need to learn how to use free cam.

It sounds like you have Smart Cast enabled!  To toggle it off, select Esc in-game and open your Key Bindings menu.  There will be a toggle for Smart Cast on or off.  Disabling it will return it to how you had it before.  Hope that helps!
